Hi everyone who is learning English with EnglishCentral.
My name is Ah Lau and I'm the goalkeeper for Albirex Niigata Singapore FC.
Today, I will introduce you one football term.
Check out this video for the moment.
The keeper catches a long ball kicked by the opposing team.
...to let his teammates know that he is going to catch the ball.
You have to say it loudly so that everyone can hear you.
All goalkeepers, please try to use this word.
